dreamPath_hero_title: An exciting adventure to find your dreams, Dream Path
dreamPath_hero_subtitle: Discover hidden possibilities within yourself with AI friends, and create the future you've only imagined!
dreamPath_what_is_my_dream_desc: Dream Path helps you discover your interests through various activities.
dreamPath_career_experience_desc: Experience future careers like astronaut, webtoon artist, and game developer with AI.
dreamPath_draw_dream_desc: Draw your imagined future, and AI will animate it.
dreamPath_mentor_conversation_desc: Ask expert AI mentors questions and get advice on your dreams.
dreamPath_ai_mentor_desc: AI mentor is a kind guide who helps solve problems and generate new ideas.
dreamPath_friends_desc: Form teams, share ideas, and present projects to build confidence.
dreamPath_for_parents_desc: Dream Path is an educational program that helps children discover talents, solve problems creatively, and utilize AI in a safe environment.
